If you go through your profile, and into settings (not edit), the site loses its Google Fonts API and drops all the fonts to Times New Roman. Can consistently recreate only through that profile settings process. Not a huge deal, but something to take a look at at some point.

Also, reason I was in profile settings in the first place is - How the heck do you get your Group badges to show? My group badge in the group itself is set to show, but it doesn't appear when I post.
